Row.Text: Hail, leader. I am Diarmuid O'Dyna, first of the knights of Fianna. If our fate is to meet on the battlefield, then I pray that it is a battle with honor.
Greetings. They call me Diarmuid of the Love Spot, although that is perhaps an unintimidating title. I hope I am not mistaken in placing my trust in you.
The mighty Irish people greet you. I, Diarmuid, their sworn protector, do vow to defend them from anything which would threaten their freedom. Are you one of those things?

I must thank you. Even if you have destroyed our countrysides and left thousands dead, you at least did so honorably, in the field of battle. My wish to fight a battle to the death with a great warrior has been fulfilled. Maybe now I can find peace in death.
Let it be known that a Fian never backs down from a challenge. Prepare yourself!
You have the advantage in numbers, that much is for certain. Should I emerge victorious, the Fianna will truly sing the song of this war for generations to come.
You're pathetic. You should know that I've hunted boars tougher than your army, so you should discard any hopes you had of winning.
Then a battle it is! We shall meet on the battlefield. Fight with honor!

Truly, if I am able to vanquish you, I will eliminate any of those tiny doubts in the backs of my soldiers' heads that I am the King of Conquerors. You are a great and powerful foe, but I know that my strength as a ruler is unrivaled!
Well, far be it for me to complain about a ruler willingly marching his troops to their doom so that I may conquer their lands with ease!
Well met, noble leader. Come, have a stein of mead!
Tch. If you've got business here, hurry and speak. I won't tolerate any treachery from scum like you.
I hereby challenge you and your forces to an honorable battle over the rights to your territory! Prepare yourself!
Now is the time for me to throw down the gauntlet. I hereby declare war upon your country! Evacuate your peasants; I only wish to fight with your soldiers!
The destiny of the Fianna is to conquer all of their foes in battle and emerge victorious as the world's strongest! You are the next opponent in line. Prepare yourself!
If you've come with an intent to deceive or manipulate me or my countrymen, you should know that your forces are insufficient to protect you should your ruses fail. Now, choose your words carefully.
Well met. May the druids foresee victory in your battle.
